name: School Loop (2013 Redesign)
description: Developed for Chromium/Chrome only. Removes unnecessary and rarely used elements, fixes formatting quirks, shrinks text, and provides a host of other functionality to improve the School Loop UI. Font: Enter a font name (installed on your computer) to use as the main font for all elements. Single Column: A single column view with the sidebar moved down below the portal Calendar. Static Header: Header (school name, "Logged in as", etc) stays at the top of the page.
additional_info: 2014-04-10 eioxyl * Released v1.07.1. * style.css: New option for defining font style. * style.css: Fixed padding issues with calendar drop down menu. 2014-04-09 eioxyl * Released v1.07.0. * style.css: Apply style only on body[data-track-user] and body[onload]. Style no longer warps school home pages (which share the same URL). 2014-03-20 eioxyl * style.css: Integrated force_font_style.css into main stylesheet. * style.css: Restyled "Recent Scores." * single_column.css: Fixed calendar page margins for week/day views. * style.css: Fixed border-top property on .cal_content_holder. * style.css: Fixed alignment issue in "No Grades Published" dashboard rows. * style.css: Clean and reorganize code to School Loop stylesheet 2014-03-06 (version_1403061110); no end-user changes. 2014-03-18 eioxyl * Released v1.06.0. * style.css, neutralized_colors.css, extra_icons.css: Integrated neutralized _colors.css and extra_icons.css into main stylesheet. * style.css: Integrated table top borders with accent. * style.css: Updated card theme box shadow. * style.css: Restyled calendar drop-down. See http://pastebin.com/WHP9JvNb for complete changelog.

style_setting_options.label: Enable
